        public PermissionGroup(java.lang.String groupName,
                       boolean isDefault,
                       java.lang.String prefix,
                       int weight,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> permissions)
        Creates a new PermissionGroup with the name, display name and permissions given
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group (used for internal purposes)
        isDefault - whether the group is a default group
        prefix - the display name of the group
        weight - the weight of the group
        permissions - the permissions of the group

    • Method Detail

      • getGroupName

        public java.lang.String getGroupName()
        Gets the group name
        The group name is used for identifying groups and running logic on them since, the players are only able to see the prefix in game.
        Returns:
        the group name
        See Also:
        getGroupName()

      • setGroupName

        public void setGroupName(java.lang.String groupName)
        Sets the group name
        The group name is used for identifying groups and running logic on them since, the players are only able to see the prefix in game.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the group name to set
        See Also:
        setGroupName(String)

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Gets the group prefix, the group prefix is used for chat formatting and other in game features where the player's group / "rank" is used. For running logic on groups, and saving them the groupName is used
        Returns:
        the group prefix
        See Also:
        getGroupName()

      • setPrefix

        public void setPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the group prefix, the group prefix is used for chat formatting and other in game features where the player's group / "rank" is used. For running logic on groups, and saving them the groupName is used
        Parameters:
        prefix - the group display name to set
        See Also:
        setGroupName(String)

      • getPermissions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPermissions()

      • getInheritedGroups

        public java.util.List<PermissionGroup> getInheritedGroups()
        Gets the groups this group inherits Inherited groups are basically parent groups, as this group has all their permissions as well.
        Returns:
        a list of all the PermissionGroups this group inherits

      • getInheritedGroupNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInheritedGroupNames()
        Gets the names of the groups this group inherits Inherited groups are basically parent groups, as this group has all their permissions as well.
        Returns:
        a list of all the group names of the inherited groups for this group

      • setInheritedGroups

        public void setInheritedGroups(java.util.List<java.lang.String> inheritedGroups)
        Sets the gorups this groups inherits Inherited groups are basically parent groups, as this group has all their permissions as well.
        Parameters:
        inheritedGroups - the new groups this group will inherit
